summary: Dragon is now transferred to be the police head of Sai Wan district, and has to contend with a gangster kingpin, anti-Manchu revolutionaries, some runaway pirates, Manchu Loyalists and a corrupt Police Superintendent.
cast: Jackie Chan|Maggie Cheung|Rosamund Kwan|Carina Lau|David Lam|Bill Tung|Ray Lui|Regina Kent|Yao Lin Chen|Kenny Ho|Mars|Kin-sang Lee|Ben Lam|John Cheung|Mickey|Ti-Ko Chen|Keung-Kuen Lai|Rocky Lai|Sing Kwong Lai|Sun Wong|Fat Wan|Billy Sau Yat Ching|Kwok-Wai Lo|Wen-Wei Lin|Kenny Bee|Tony Wong|Ricky Hui|Kwok-Leung Ngan|Clarence Yiu-leung Fok|Abdullah Chai|Isabella Wong|Fung Woo|Kwok-Hung Lam|Kwan-Min Cheng|Wellson Chin|Hoson Chan|Tin Sang Lung|Yuen Ling Tao|Wai-Leung Pau|Lai Bik Kwong|Ping Wu|Audrey Wasilewski|Lex Lang|Fred Tatasciore|Steve Staley|Tom Konkle|Jessica Gee-George|Michelle Ruff|Ed McCarthy|Keith Ferguson|Liana Maeby|Michael Sorich|Jody Rath|Bob Papenbrook|Bob Joles|Edowan Bersmea|Anthony Chan|Kwok-Kuen Chan|Michael Wai-Man Chan|Sai-Tang Chan|Tat-Kwong Chan|Wah Cheung|Tiet Wo Chu|Mei Sheng Fan|K. title: Los tesoros del mar de China
